place.name: CILGWRWG
place.gazetteerText: KILGWRRWG, or KILGOOROOG, a parish in Chepstow district, Monmouth; 5 miles SE of Llandenny r. station, and 5¾ NW of Chepstow. Post town, Usk, under Newport, Monmouth. Acres, 659. Real property, £628. Pop., 121. Houses, 25. The property is divided among a few. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £57. Patron, the Archdeacon of Llandaff. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
